Plus Size 1x Lingerie
Plus Size 1x Intimates

Fall head over heels in love with lingerie! Rainbow has plus size 1X lingerie like bralettes, panties, and teddies that are perfect for any special night or even everyday wear. Our lingerie is made to highlight sexy figures in style. Perfect for fashionable curvy girls like you! Shop plus size 1X lingerie from Rainbow for gorgeous looks at low prices.

Womens 1X Swimsuits
Womens 1X Bathing Suits

Make a splash in Rainbow's 1X swimsuits! Our sexy plus size swimsuits are here to hug your curves and flatter your figure. Browse bold colors like blue, red, and yellow or check out pretty prints and graphics. With such a great selection, we have swimsuits to fit every kind of style! Soak up some sun in stylish and comfortable 1X swimsuits from Rainbow. Want more coverage? Check out our cute cover up tops, dusters, and pants! Looking for fabulous footwear? Pick up a pair of sandals to complete your beautiful beachy look!

Plus Size 2x Lingerie
Plus Size 2x Intimates

We're totally crushing on this ultra sexy lingerie! Rainbow's plus size 2X lingerie includes bralettes, panties, teddies, and more. Explore amazing colors, lovely lace, and cute caging! Our comfortable plus size lingerie is made to naturally highlight and support your curvy figure. Find flattering and affordable plus size 2X lingerie from Rainbow now!

Womens 2X Swimsuits
Womens 2X Bathing Suits

Every body is a beach body! Bare some skin in Rainbow's stylish and comfortable 2X swimsuits. We have a wide variety of pretty prints, colors, and graphics for you to choose from, so you're sure to find swimsuits that fit your style. Shop figure-flattering plus size swimsuits for affordable prices today! Looking for more? We've got you covered. Explore Rainbow's selection of sexy cover ups to make even more of a statement. Don't forget to check out our sweet deals on sandals too!

Plus Size 3x Lingerie
Plus Size 3x Intimates

Blessed with curves? We have the lingerie for you! Rainbow has great selection of plus size 3X lingerie like bralettes, panties, teddies, and more. It'll be love at first sight when you see our fun colors, flirty lace, and beautiful bow details. Look and feel sexy! Shop Rainbow for comfortable, supportive, and affordable plus size 3X lingerie.

Womens 3X Swimsuits
Womens 3X Bathing Suits

Finding plus size swimsuits that are stylish and comfortable is hard, but at Rainbow it's easy! We have a great selection of 3X swimsuits made to flatter your figure and hug your curves. Explore bathing suits in beautiful blues, reds, yellows, and more! We know you'll look and feel confident in Rainbow's plus size swimsuits. Shop today for amazing steals and deals! Want more coverage? Check out our cover ups like fishnet tops, dusters, and pants. If you need some fancy footwear, be sure to pick up a pair of sandals too!

Womens Accessories
Juniors Accessories

No outfit is complete without the right accessories. Rainbow's got the goods when it comes to the hottest bags. We've got backpacks to help you stay stylish in the classroom and fanny packs to make carrying your essentials around easier. Need some bling to amp up your look? Browse through our necklaces, earrings, and bracelets to find the perfect jewelry to compliment your outfit. Let's not forget about our sunglasses! We've got tons of frames that will flatter everyone. Need a subtle way to tie your look together? Try one of our belts. It's just the accessory to reach for when you want to cinch in your waist or add some contrast to your look. Still not enough? We've got hats, headbands, scarves, and more, so start shopping!

Quantities are limited, so act fast and treat yourself!
Low prices, everyday free shipping, free returns to our 1000+ stores, and new additions to our shop daily!

Womens Bags and Backpacks
Juniors Bags and Backpacks

From crossbody bags to clutches, we've got it all! Our bags and backpacks at Rainbow come in all of the hottest styles, prints, and colors. Whether you're an on-the-go gal who needs a backpack or a fanny pack, or you'd rather reach for an animal print clutch to make your LBD stand out, Rainbow's got you covered!

Whether you're on the hunt for some gorgeous beading, or you'd rather go for something with a chain detailing and charms, we've got you!

Quantities are limited, so act fast and treat yourself!
Low prices, everyday free shipping, free returns to our 1000+ stores, and new additions to our shop daily!

Belts

There's no better way to tie your whole look together than a belt. They're just the accessory you need to add a subtle, yet necessary detail to your outfit. Take your everyday, casual t shirt and jeans combo to the next level by adding a skinny faux leather belt. Layer a midi skirt over a bodysuit, then add a statement belt with an animal print design or a tortoise buckle for a chic touch. Going clubbing in your favorite tube dress? Add a neon colored belt to cinch in your waist for a fun, sexy detail that provides just the right amount of color contrast. However you choose to style them, our belts are just the finishing touch you need, no matter what you're wearing!

Quantities are limited, so act fast and treat yourself!
Low prices, everyday free shipping, free returns to our 1000+ stores, and new additions to our shop daily!

Face Masks

Social distancing is the new norm to keep us all healthy and safe. But, it's not always easy to stay 6 feet apart when you're out and about. Cloth face masks offer an additional layer of protection from germs that you or someone else may be carrying.

Rainbow Shops face masks will be your new favorite accessory. Our face masks come in different colors and prints, so you don't have to sacrifice looking cute! Order more than one to match all your outfits.

Cloth face masks are washable and reusable. They are non-medical grade and not intended for medical use.

Shop our entire collection of little girls clothing and wear your Rainbow Shops outfits together. She'll be your cutest mini-me!

Teens Clothing

Shopping for a teen girl can also be very personal. Rainbow Shop wants to make sure that all girls are comfortable in their bodies. Rainbow Shops selection of clothes for teenage girls makes it easy for all the moms and dads to shop with their growing girls. We're budget friendly too, so you'll never need to worry about something being too expensive!

Kids Accessories

Womens Plus Size Bodysuits
Juniors Plus Size Bodysuits

What is a plus size bodysuit?
It's a one-piece form-fitting top, similar to a plus size leotard. This versatile top type is an essential piece to every women's wardrobe. It can be worn as a layering piece or on its own.

How to put it on:
Plus size bodysuits are made with and without snap closures at the crotch. Those that are not made with snap closures are easy to slip on. However, they can be a hassle when using the bathroom. If you prefer not having to get naked in the bathroom stall, then we would recommend a plus size bodysuit with a snap closure. Snap closures are either two to three small snap buttons, two to three hook and eye clasps, or velcro.

What do you wear it with?
Plus size bodysuits can be seamlessly tucked into any bottom type. You don't need to worry about the hem of this top creating a visible line or having to continuously pull it down to cover your stomach. The bottom coverage of a plus size bodysuit varies, so you can decide which is the most comfortable for you: full coverage, cheeky, or thong. Since the plus size bodysuit is form-fitting, it is also comfortable to wear under another top type or under outerwear.

Why we love it:
We love plus size bodysuits because they are flattering on every body shape. They hug those curves so we can show them off. It gives us that little boost of confidence we're all looking for. We also love that they come in different materials such as mesh, lace, crochet, cotton, and spandex.

We are constantly adding new plus size bodysuits to Rainbow Shops online store. Check out our selection daily so you don't miss out!

Plus size cami dresses are one of the most simple and versatile dress silhouettes. It's a must have essential in your closet and perfect for layering. It can be layered over or under one of your other favorite pieces. We promise that you can never have too many!

A plus size cami dress - sometimes referred to as plus size camisole dress, plus size slip dress, or plus size spaghetti strap dress - is usually short but can sometimes be midi or maxi in length. Very feminine and chic, it has thin straps and can either be loose fitting or tight fitting. Our plus size cami dresses come in different fabrics and a variety of solid colors (black, beige, red, burgundy, pink, yellow) and prints (polka dot, striped, floral, tie dye). Some may also include side slits, buttons, or a cute hemline detail. We are always adding new plus size camisole dresses to our site. Make sure to check back daily and order before your favorites are sold out.

Rainbow Shops plus size slip dresses are lightweight and comfortable, so you can wear them day or night (or day into night). Plus Size Cocktail Dresses

We've all gotten that invitation with the words "cocktail attire" on it. It can be a little intimidating and stressful. What are you allowed to wear? What does that phrase even mean? It just sounds fancy and expensive, right? Rainbow understands and we've created a collection filled with plus size cocktail dresses to help you out. And because we love saving money just as much as you do, our collection is priced with your budget in mind. We'll worry about the little details and you worry about having fun!

Some simple rules to keep in mind when searching for your perfect outfit:

  • Don't wear something too revealing. Keep hemlines and necklines appropriate. Basically, don't wear anything you wouldn't want your grandparents to see!
  • Don't wear something too formal (yes, there is such thing as too formal).
  • The dress length you are looking for is between mini and midi.
  • Stay away from super short. You can check this by placing your arms flat against your sides - the hemline should be longer than your fingertips.
  • Stay away from floor-length.

Plus Size Party Dresses

Because we love all types of parties, we've also mixed in a few plus size party dresses to our collection.
There are no rules here, so pick the dress you'll be most comfortable dancing in all night!

Womens Plus Size Off the Shoulder Dresses
Juniors Plus Size Off the Shoulder Dresses

A plus size off the shoulder dress is any dress silhouette with an off-the-shoulder neckline. The off-the-shoulder neckline, also known as the Bardot neckline, was made popular in the 1950's by actress Brigitte Bardot. It has an elastic gathering at the neckline and exposes your shoulders and collar bones. The trim of an off-the-shoulder neckline can be plain, ruffled, or smocked.

Plus size off the shoulder dresses can be tight or loose. They can be sleeveless, short sleeves, or long sleeves. Some of the plus size off-the-shoulder-dresses that are sleeveless have a ruffle overlay falling from the neckline to the bust, creating a sleeve illusion. This dress style comes in any length from short to maxi.

Rainbow Shops offers a variety of plus size off the shoulder dresses all year long.
Here are some of our suggestions for each season:

  • Spring: Floral and leaf prints are perfect for the warm weather. Light and bright colors also make us happy because we know summer is next!
  • Summer: We love picking a flowy, light-weight material for the hot weather. Top patterns would be tie-dye, camo, and polka dot. We also love neon colors for this season.
  • Fall: The weather starts to get cooler, so we like to opt for a plus size off the shoulder dress with a little more length.
  • Winter: It's not too cold for a plus size off-the-shoulder dress! Pick a dress silhouette with a thick ribbed knit and long sleeves. It'll still keep you warm and cozy.

Womens Plus Size Off the Shoulder Tops
Juniors Plus Size Off the Shoulder Tops

The plus size off the shoulder top is a must have for girls who want to show off just a little bit of skin. This top style is any top with an off-the-shoulder neckline. The off-the-shoulder neckline, also known as the Bardot neckline, was made popular by actress Brigitte Bardot in the 1950's. It has an elastic gathering at the neckline and exposes your collar bones and shoulders. The trim of an off-the-shoulder neckline can be basic, ruffled, or smocked.

Plus size off the shoulder tops can be any sleeve length. Plus size OTS tops that are sleeveless have a ruffle overlay falling from the neckline to the bust, creating a short sleeve illusion. And just because your shoulders are bare, does not mean you can't wear this top style in the colder seasons. Stay warm with plus size off the shoulder tops long sleeve.
Fit type varies too. Pick a plus size OTS top that is fitted and accentuates your curves. Or pick a loose fitting top that is both cute and comfortable.

Rainbow Shops plus size off-the-shoulder-tops come in different solid colors, patterns, and prints. Choose from plus size white off the shoulder tops to plus size black off the shoulder tops for a simple look. Or opt to stand out in floral and striped patterns.

We love to wear our plus size off the shoulder tops everywhere. Show us how you wear your plus size off-the-shoulder top and tag us @RainbowShops!

The plus size shift dress silhouette falls straight from shoulder to hemline. It is usually short in length and has a loose fit through bust, waist, and hips. Womens Plus Size Wrap Dresses
Juniors Plus Size Wrap Dresses

The classic dress silhouette you never knew you needed - the plus size wrap dress. Sophisticated and stylish, it has been a closet staple since the 1970's. It is universally flattering on all body shapes. The tie waist accentuates your waist, achieving that hour glass figure. The v shape neckline gives you cleavage control, so show a little or show a lot - it's all up to you!

A plus size wrap front dress is meant to be comfortable and easy to wear. Typically designed to be opened, so it is easy to put on. If you're normally in between sizes, this is the perfect silhouette for you. The open design of the dress lets you control sizing - wrap it a little tighter or a little looser. Best part of it all: you'll never have to worry about getting makeup on the fabric while trying to pull it over your head. If this is your first plus size wrap dress, just follow the how to steps below.

Wearing Your Plus Size Wrap Dress:

  • Simply wrap one side of the dress over the other.
  • Find the small holes on the dress (usually on the sides). Some dresses may only have one hole.
  • Pull one end of the tie waist through the hole(s) and around until both ends meet. Style tip: the tie waist can meet at the front, side, or back for a different look each time.

Don't worry, there's another option for ladies who love the wrap silhouette but hate the thought of having to wrap it - the plus size faux wrap dress. The same dress silhouette with an illusion of a wrap, so you can throw it right on.

Our plus size wrap front dresses come in all lengths: mini, midi, and maxi. Favorite patterns for this style are polka dots and floral. We are confident you'll love our plus size wrap dresses and plus size faux wrap dresses.
